name: PushReturnOrder
description:
Creates a returnorder with all specified data

It is required to send the identifier for the ReturnOrder of the external system by providing a BackendSystemID and a BackendID.

A return is based of an OriginalOrder. This order can be identifier by the OriginalBackendID or the OriginalOrderID. One of those is required.

If the stock is already received, set the `AlreadyReceived` to true. This will ship the order immediately.

If the stock is already received and the open amount should be refunded directly, set `AutoRefund` to true.

The Lines have to be identified by the original line, this should be done by providing the OriginalBackendID or the OriginalOrderLineID.
If those are not available the CustomID of the product can be set, but matching based on that is not advised.

properties.name: AlreadyReceived
properties.description: Ship the order immediately

properties.name: AutoRefund
properties.description: Try to refund the order immediately

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: A unique identifier for the order, within the context of given `BackendSystemID`

properties.name: BackendSystemID
properties.description: A code, free of choice for the calling 3rd party application creating the order

properties.name: IsCustomerReturn
properties.description: If this order pending a customer return

properties.name: CustomID
properties.description: Article number of the product from the 3rd party

properties.name: OriginalBackendID
properties.description: ID of the original orderline from the 3rd party

properties.name: Quantity
properties.description: Quantity that has been returned, positive

properties.name: Remark
properties.description: Remark describing something return related

properties.name: OriginalBackendID
properties.description: The unique identifier of the original order, within the context of given `BackendSystemID`

properties.name: Remark
properties.description: Remark on the order (optional)

properties.name: ReturnToOrganizationUnitBackendID
properties.description: Identifier for the organizationunit where the stock will be returned

properties.name: AlreadyExists
properties.description: If the order with the specified BackendID already existed

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
